text: Roberto Martín Rivas Tagliabúe (born 14 March 1992) is a Uruguayan footballer who plays as a defender for Liverpool F.C. in the Uruguayan Primera División. ==References== ==External links== *Profile at ESPN FC Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Montevideo Wanderers F.C. players Category:Liverpool F.C. (Montevideo) players Category:Uruguayan Primera División players Category:Uruguayan footballers Category:Association football defenders
title: Martín Rivas (footballer, born 1992)
